Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Reproductive System Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Reproductive System Disorder/Female Non-Neoplastic Reproductive System Disorder/Endometriosis
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: A condition in which functional endometrial tissue is present outside the UTERUS. It is often confined to the PELVIS involving the OVARY, the ligaments, cul-de-sac, and the uterovesical peritoneum.An enlarged area of ENDOMETRIOSIS that resembles a tumor. It is usually found in the OVARY. When it is filled with old blood, it is known as a chocolate cyst.The extension of endometrial tissue into the MYOMETRIUM.
